EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for visiting NCR at EuroCIS 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We enjoyed connecting with you and sharing the latest in digital retail trends. We hope you got the chance to experience the technology that is helping retailers all over the globe solve their biggest challenges. When you’re ready to unleash your potential with a trusted partner who really knows retail, please be in touch. With NCR’s advanced technology, we can transform your store, simplify operations and help you compete in online ordering. If you weren’t able to stop by our stand, you can still schedule a one-on-one consultation with a member of our team to talk about your specific needs and goals. Or visit NCR.com and explore the many ways we’re helping retail leaders like you prepare for the next season of success.
